DOC.detailed_description: 20 adolescent boy ( 10 obese 10 lean ) 20 men ( 10 obese 10 lean ) complete sub-maximal test ergo cycle draw linear relationship VO2 Fc . Then enter metabolic chamber three time , 24 hour . A first session consider sedentary , volunteer remain inactive . During second third session , complete cycle test generate energy expenditure 400 Kcal , low intensity ( 40 % VO2max ) high intensity ( 70 % VO2max ) . Those three session realize randomized order interval least 7 day urinary collection 24hours do session . DOC.criteria: Male Adults 18 30 year old adolescent 12 15 year old Body mass index : lean adult : 20 < BMI < 25 kg.m² obese adult : 30 < BMI < 38 kg.m² lean adolescent : BMI < 90th percentile obese adolescent : BMI > 97th percentile Affiliated National Health Insurance Subject give write informed consent Subject consider normal clinical examination medical questionnaire .
